name: Meupass
description: Meupass is an innovative platform designed to revolutionize the event and gastronomy sectors by offering technological solutions for seamless event check-ins, restaurant tab openings, and QR code-based ordering, sending requests directly to the kitchen. Additionally, Meupass leverages blockchain technology to reward investors by distributing 10% of annual profits to MPS token holders. Our goal is to enhance efficiency for both users and businesses.
